title.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, April 19, 1926. Grand Popular Bazaar for the Benefit of the Socrates Greek SchoolGiven by the Association of the Holy Trinity Greek Community of Chicago Three-day Fair in the School Bldg. 742 Sibley Street.

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, April 19, 1926. GRAND POPULAR BAZAAR FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE SOCRATES GREEK SCHOOLGiven By THE ASSOCIATION OF THE HOLY TRINITY GREEK COMMUNITY OF CHICAGO Three-day Fair in the School Bldg. 742 Sibley Street.

body.p: Saturday, Sunday and Monday, April 24, 25, and 26, from 2 to 9 P. M. Admission free. All our fellow-countrymen will contribute various articles for sale.
The ladies of our community are preparing to flood the bazaar with their embroidery.
The school is expecting your contribution. Be generous.
